Plot: The reality of life slams into the proverbial wall when a group of necessitous best friends and ex-lovers are reunited at a milestone reunion, igniting an already passionate and combustible past.
Title: An American Reunion
Writer: Jim Fitzpatrick (screenplay), Jim Fitzpatrick (story and play)
Actors: Jim Fitzpatrick, Jodi Knotts, Corbin Timbrook, John Bradley
